basic.description: A detailed study of one area or topic in the history of 19th-century visual culture.
basic.subject: ARTH
basic.title: Topics in 19th-century Visual and Material Culture

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    A GPA of 2.6 in a minium of 24.0 units in ARTH and Level 4 and registration in an ARTH Major or Medial Plan.
